Text: #G19# As an InformalCaregiver, I want to have a game that the carer could play together with the user, so that it would enable to monitor the users' state of health but also have some fun time.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to be able to see whether I already have taken my pills, so that I can avoid an overdose.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have a regular summary on how much exercise is performed by the user.
#G19# As a developer, I want to present my app to as many people as Possible.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED contact the nearest caregiver when I ask ALFRED for urgent help.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to maintain my contact list in my phone.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED on a bracelet or a necklace, so that I can always wear him with me.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to be able to zoom into visual content.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED to remind me to keep a good body posture.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to help me navigate despite my mild cognitive impairments.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have video conversation with others.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to receive suggestions about local sport Classes.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have feedback on the activity level of the user.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have ALFRED to propose training that promotes complex thinking.
#G19# As a developer, I want to have detailed information of what happened when my App crashes on the user's device.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to receive support to use the public transport.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to insert my meetings into ALFRED using speech.
#G19# As a developer, I want to present my App in several ways.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have ALFRED to remind people to exercise regularly.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to do guided exercises with ALFRED and ALFRED should also use sensors to capture health data while I am doing exercises.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to use video calls in case of emergency.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have ALFRED to be able to determine the user's breathing frequency.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to control the TV and radio.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to receive a reminder from ALFRED on all the things I need to bring with me when I leave the house.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to be able to see if the patient has taken her medicine.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to games that require the combination of mental and physical exercise, such as opposing motion exercises of the arms and legs.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED for navigation.
